learn:
Enter all relevant release details here & connect digital files to a release.

If you’d like to sell this release click on asset settings below (look for the gear icon) and add it to inventory. You'll still need to make a single purchase element before you can put it up for sale.

Making download codes? Once you’ve added your release info you can then generate and export download codes under the asset settings section. You don’t have to have a fulfillment file up yet to generate them but make sure you’ve uploaded it, and made a corresponding download code redemption form element, before you start sending those codes out!

You can always change any details - all linked commerce items and elements will automatically reflect the changes.

copy.no_files_yet: No files have been added for fulfillment yet.
copy.no_download_codes: There are no download codes for this asset.
copy.add_release_if_sell: Add this release to your commerce inventory if you would like to sell it.
